00013 RawWriter::RawWriter() : 
00014   BaseModule(RawWriter::GetDefaultName(),
00015              "Saves the (gzip'ped) raw data from the digitizers to disk"), 
00016   _fout(), _logout(), _log_messenger(0), _ok(true), _bytes_written(0)
00017 {
00018   RegisterParameter("filename",_filename = "",
00019                     "Name of the output file; if it doesn't contain a /, assumed relative to <directory>");
00020   RegisterParameter("directory",_directory=".", 
00021                     "Directory in which to place the output file");
00022   RegisterParameter("create_directory", _create_directory = false,
00023                     "If true, create a new directory under the <directory> path with the base filename");
00024   RegisterParameter("filenamebase", _autonamebase = "rawdaq" ,
00025                     "Base for automatic filenames <base>_yymmddHHMM.###.out");
00026   RegisterParameter("compression", _compression = Z_BEST_SPEED,
00027                     "zip compression level of the event structures");
00028   RegisterParameter("save_config", _save_config = true,
00029                     "Do we save the configuration along with the data?");
00030   RegisterParameter("max_file_size", _max_file_size = 0x80000000, //2 GiB
00031                     "Maximum file size before making a new file");
00032   RegisterParameter("max_event_in_file", _max_event_in_file = 10000 , 
00033                     "Maximum number of events before making a new file");
00034 
00035   ConfigHandler* config = ConfigHandler::GetInstance();
00036   config->AddCommandSwitch('f',"filename", "File for saving raw data",
00037                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<std::string>(_filename),
00038                            "file");
00039   config->AddCommandSwitch('d',"directory","Output directory for raw file",
00040                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<std::string>(_directory),
00041                            "directory");
00042   config->AddCommandSwitch('c',"compression","Raw data compression level",
00043                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(_compression),
00044                            "level");
00045 }

00047 RawWriter::~RawWriter()
00048 {
00049   if(_fout.is_open())
00050     CloseCurrentFile();
00051 }

00053 std::string RawWriter::GetDefaultFilename() const
00054 {
00055   //create the default filename
00056   time_t rawtime;
00057   time(&rawtime);
00058   struct tm *timeinfo;
00059   timeinfo = localtime(&rawtime);
00060   char fbuf[100];
00061   strftime(fbuf,100,"%y%m%d%H%M",timeinfo);
00062   return _autonamebase+"_"+fbuf;
00063     
00064 }
00065 
00066 int RawWriter::Initialize()
00067 {
00068   if( _filename == ""){
00069     //was not set manually, so use auto
00070     _filename = GetDefaultFilename();
00071   }
00072   
00073   //see if we need to prepend the directory
00074   if( _filename.find("/") ==std::string::npos && _directory != ""){
00075     std::string temp = _directory;
00076     if(temp[temp.size()-1] != '/')
00077       temp.append("/");
00078     temp.append(_filename);
00079     _filename=temp;
00080   }
00081   //see if we need to remove the .out suffix
00082   if( _filename.rfind(".out") != std::string::npos)
00083     _filename.resize(_filename.size()-4);
00084   
00085   //make a directory before starting the file if requested
00086   if(_create_directory){
00087     std::string dirpart="", filepart=_filename;
00088     size_t slash = _filename.find_last_of('/');
00089     if(slash != std::string::npos){
00090       dirpart = _filename.substr(0,slash+1);
00091       filepart = _filename.substr(slash+1);
00092     }
00093     //filepart _should_ have suffixes removed...
00094     dirpart += filepart;
00095     Message(INFO)<<"Attempting to create directory "<<dirpart<<std::endl;
00096     int err = mkdir(dirpart.c_str(),S_IRWXU|S_IRWXG|S_IROTH|S_IXOTH);
00097     if(err){
00098         Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to create output directory "<<dirpart<<"\n";
00099         return err;
00100     }
00101     _filename = dirpart + "/" + filepart;
00102   }
00103   
00104   //set the run id
00105   _ghead.run_id = EventHandler::GetInstance()->GetRunID();
00106   //set the file index
00107   _ghead.file_index = 0;
00108   //open up the log file
00109   std::string logfilename = _filename+".log";
00110   _logout.open(logfilename.c_str());
00111   if(_logout.is_open()){
00112     _log_messenger = MessageHandler::GetInstance()->
00113       AddMessenger(DEBUG, MessageHandler::PrintToStream(_logout,false) );
00114     Message(DEBUG)<<"Started logging messages to "<<logfilename<<".\n";
00115   }
00116   else{
00117     Message(WARNING)<<"Unable to open logfile "<<logfilename
00118                     <<"; messages will not be logged!\n";
00119   } 
00120   //write the partial config file
00121   if(_save_config)
00122     SaveConfigFile();
00123   return OpenNewFile();
00124 }
00125 
00126 int RawWriter::Process(EventPtr event)
00127 {
00128   if(!_ok){
00129     Message(ERROR)<<"Attempt to write to file in bad state!\n";
00130     return 1;
00131   }
00132   
00133   typedef Reader::datablock_header datablock_header;
00134   //compress all of the datablocks into a separate buffer
00135   //each block has compressed size, including header, uncompressed data size, 
00136   //and type as header
00137   //determine the total size of the output buffer
00138   uint32_t bufsize = sizeof(Reader::event_header);
00139   for(size_t i = 0; i<event->GetRawEvent()->GetNumDataBlocks(); i++){
00140     bufsize += compressBound(event->GetRawEvent()->GetDataBlockSize(i)) + 
00141       sizeof(datablock_header);
00142   }
00143   //zip the data into the buffer
00144   std::vector<char> buf(bufsize);
00145   size_t zipsize=sizeof(Reader::event_header);
00146   for(size_t i = 0;i<event->GetRawEvent()->GetNumDataBlocks(); i++){
00147     //write the data into a space after the header
00148     uLong thistransfer = bufsize-zipsize-sizeof(datablock_header);
00149     int err = 0;
00150     if(_compression == Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION){
00151       err = compress((Bytef*)(&buf[zipsize+sizeof(datablock_header)]),
00152                      &thistransfer,
00153                      event->GetRawEvent()->GetRawDataBlock(i),
00154                      event->GetRawEvent()->GetDataBlockSize(i));
00155     }
00156     else{
00157       err = compress2((Bytef*)(&buf[zipsize+sizeof(datablock_header)]),
00158                       &thistransfer,
00159                       event->GetRawEvent()->GetRawDataBlock(i),
00160                       event->GetRawEvent()->GetDataBlockSize(i),
00161                       _compression);
00162     }
00163     if(err != Z_OK){
00164       Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to compress event datablocks in memory\n";
00165       return -1;
00166     }
00167     //write the header
00168     datablock_header* db_head = (datablock_header*)(&buf[zipsize]);
00169     db_head->total_blocksize_disk = sizeof(datablock_header)+thistransfer;
00170     db_head->datasize = event->GetRawEvent()->GetDataBlockSize(i);
00171     db_head->type = event->GetRawEvent()->GetDataBlockType(i);
00172     zipsize += db_head->total_blocksize_disk;
00173     
00174   }
00175   //set values in the event header
00176   Reader::event_header* ehead = (Reader::event_header*)(&buf[0]);
00177   ehead->event_size = zipsize;
00178   ehead->event_id = event->GetRawEvent()->GetID();
00179   ehead->timestamp = event->GetRawEvent()->GetTimestamp();
00180   ehead->nblocks = event->GetRawEvent()->GetNumDataBlocks();
00181 
00182   //see if we need to make a new file
00183   if(_ghead.nevents>=(uint32_t)_max_event_in_file || 
00184      _ghead.file_size + ehead->event_size > _max_file_size){
00185     if( CloseCurrentFile() || OpenNewFile() ){
00186       Message(ERROR)<<"Error occurred when trying to open new file!\n";
00187       return 1;
00188     }
00189   }
00190   
00191   //actually write the event
00192   if(!_fout.write((const char*)(&buf[0]), zipsize)){
00193     Message(ERROR)<<"Error occurred when writing event "<<ehead->event_id
00194                   <<"to disk!\n";
00195     return -1;
00196   }
00197   _bytes_written += ehead->event_size;
00198   //update info for global header
00199   _ghead.nevents++;
00200   if(_ghead.event_id_min > ehead->event_id)
00201     _ghead.event_id_min = ehead->event_id;
00202   _ghead.event_id_max = ehead->event_id;
00203   _ghead.file_size += ehead->event_size;
00204   
00205   return 0;
00206 }
00207 
00208 int RawWriter::Finalize()
00209 {
00210   if(_fout.is_open()){
00211     CloseCurrentFile();
00212     Message(INFO)<<_bytes_written/1024/1024<<" MiB saved to "<<_filename<<"\n";
00213     if(_bytes_written==0){
00214       //Message(WARNING)<<"0 bytes saved; deleting file."<<std::endl;
00215       //char command[40];
00216       //sprintf(command,"rm -f %s",_filename.c_str());
00217       //int result = system(command);
00218       //if(result)
00219       //Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to delete file!\n";
00220     }
00221   }
00222   if(_save_config && _bytes_written > 0){
00223     SaveConfigFile();
00224   }
00225   if(_logout.is_open()){
00226     Message(DEBUG)<<"Closing logfile.\n";
00227     MessageHandler::GetInstance()->RemoveMessenger(_log_messenger);
00228     _log_messenger = 0;
00229     _logout.close();
00230   }
00231   return 0;
00232 }
00233 
00234 
00235 int RawWriter::OpenNewFile()
00236 {
00237   if(_fout.is_open()){
00238     Message(WARNING)<<"Tried to open new file while current file still open!\n";
00239     CloseCurrentFile();
00240   }
00241   
00242   //set the filename to filename.###.out, where ### is file_index
00243   std::stringstream fname;
00244   fname<<_filename<<"."<<std::setw(3)<<std::setfill('0')
00245        <<_ghead.file_index<<".out";
00246   Message(INFO)<<"Opening file "<<fname.str()<<std::endl;
00247   _fout.open(fname.str().c_str(), std::ios::out|std::ios::binary);
00248   if(!_fout.is_open()){
00249     Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to open file "<<fname.str()<<" for output!\n";
00250     _ok = false;
00251     return 1;
00252   }
00253   //write the "blank" global header 
00254   _ghead.start_time = time(0);
00255   //reset nevents
00256   _ghead.nevents = 0;
00257   //set min event id to max value so we can set it properly during Process
00258   _ghead.event_id_min = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00259   //same for max id
00260   _ghead.event_id_max = 0;
00261   //reset the file_size 
00262   _ghead.file_size = _ghead.global_header_size;
00263   
00264   if(!_fout.write((const char*)(&_ghead), _ghead.global_header_size)){
00265     Message(ERROR)<<"RawWriter: Error writing header to file "<<fname<<"\n";
00266     return 2;
00267   }
00268   
00269   return 0;
00270 }
00271 
00272 int RawWriter::CloseCurrentFile()
00273 {
00274   if(!_fout.is_open())
00275     return 0;
00276   //save the completed global header
00277   _ghead.end_time = time(0);
00278   _fout.seekp(0);
00279   _fout.write((const char*)(&_ghead), _ghead.global_header_size);
00280   _fout.close();
00281   //increment the file_index counter
00282   _ghead.file_index++;
00283   return 0;
00284 }
00285 
00286 void RawWriter::SaveConfigFile()
00287 {
00288   //strip the '.gz' off the end of the file
00289   std::string cfgfile(_filename);
00290   if(_filename.rfind(".gz") != std::string::npos)
00291     cfgfile.resize(cfgfile.size()-3);
00292   //strip off .out
00293   if(_filename.rfind(".out") != std::string::npos)
00294     cfgfile.resize(cfgfile.size()-4);
00295   ConfigHandler::GetInstance()->SaveToFile((cfgfile+".cfg").c_str());
00296   
00297 }
